dimensions: Warp x Weft: 261 x 124 cm (8 ft. 6 3/4 in. x 48 13/16 in.)
title: Textile
medium:
Medium: linen, cotton
Technique: plain weave
description: Irregular vertical tan stripe on a black ground, designed as a dividing curtain for the Harvard Graduate Center dormitories.  The warp is of thin black cotton and heavier undyed linen.  The black cotton wefts are used singly where interlacing with the black warp, and paired where interlacing with the natural warp, the effect being of a dense black band alternating with a speckled stripe.
name: Textile
